author: marrs
msg: FELIX-3139 Implemented first version of uninstall. Does not follow the spec yet to the letter, but functionally does the right thing.

author: dag
msg: DERBY-5413 NetworkServerControl#main can exit with status 1 without printing an error message to console
Patch derby-5413, which makes sure the server doesn't die silently
even if the debug flag has not been set.

author: rmannibucau
msg: fixing quickly cdi ejb management CheckPersistenceRefs to validate

author: pamarcelot
msg: Added the possibility to include a configuration page for each LDAP Server Adapter.
This configuration page adds a new Configuration wizard page and a new Configuration property page.
Configuration parameters are saved in the LDAP Server (which is saved on the disk).
